title: Subscription Cancelled
description: Fired when a subscription is cancelled.

planId.description: Unique identifier for the subscription plan.

planName.description: Human-readable name of the subscription plan.

feedback.description: Additional feedback provided by the user about the cancellation.

effectiveDate.description: ISO 8601 date or datetime when the cancellation takes effect.

willExpireAt.description: ISO 8601 date or datetime when the subscription access will expire.
